mapper.select: select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id}

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,c.organization_cd ,e.organization_name ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join am006_employeebelongs c on c.employee_id = a.employee_id and c.start_yearmonth = (select max(d.start_yearmonth) from am006_employeebelongs d where d.employee_id = c.employee_id and d.start_yearmonth <= to_char(now(),'YYYYMM')) left join am002_organization e on e.organization_cd = c.organization_cd order by a.employee_cd

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,c.organization_cd ,e.organization_name ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join am006_employeebelongs c on c.employee_id = a.employee_id and c.start_yearmonth = (select max(d.start_yearmonth) from am006_employeebelongs d where d.employee_id = c.employee_id and d.start_yearmonth <= to_char(now(),'YYYYMM')) left join am002_organization e on e.organization_cd = c.organization_cd where a.employee_cd like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_cd} , '%') and a.employee_name1_last like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_name1_last} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') order by a.employee_cd
